title: sagarbansal21
author: sagarbansal21
content: CIFDAQ launches its newsletter by Dr. Jihad Kandil, CTO at CIFDAQ, "Into the future of blockchain."Dr. Jihad is a Blockchain specialist with a Ph.D. and MBA degree in Blockchain.Read more to understand blockchain implications in global crisis: https://www.linkedin.com/newsletters/innovations-into-the-future-7000755643519250433
